settings.title: ABOUT US
settings.content:
Bombay Shaving Company is a premium personal care and grooming solutions brand committed to delivering truly remarkable customer experiences.

Ours thoughtfully curated personal care regimens double-up as the perfect gifting options for special occasions, too. Come, shine like never before with products made with love!

settings.title: Let's get to know each other!
settings.content: Drop your email to get latest updates on what’s hot, special offers and tips to always look hot-shot.

settings.quote: " I'm a regular charcoal facewash user. I felt really happy to grab the charcoal facewash at a very cheap price compared to other shopping sites. Thanks 🙏 "
" Had bought it earlier as sample and it's really awesome. Smells good and feels refreshing. "

The six pieces set is a good variety as far as the value of this product is concerned. I  use beard butter regularly and it's very useful and makes my beard very soft. Moreover, the different types of oils in the kit have a very good smell which makes my face even more attractive. For me, quantity is not the concern if the quality is good and this is really nice and with this amazing packaging I'll gift it to my brother as well.
